sections.title: Alchemist (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Alchemist class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Alchemist)
sections.description: Alchemists are proficient with all simple weapons, bombs, and light armor, but not shields.

sections.title: Alchemy (Su) (Alchemist)
sections.description: Alchemists create magical extracts (potion-like spells), gain bonuses to Craft (alchemy) checks, and can identify potions using alchemical knowledge.

sections.title: Bomb (Su) (Alchemist)
sections.description: Alchemists can create and throw explosive bombs that deal fire damage plus Intelligence modifier, with splash damage on a miss.

sections.title: Brew Potion (Ex) (Alchemist)
sections.description: Alchemists receive Brew Potion as a bonus feat and can create potions from any formula they know up to 3rd level.

sections.title: Mutagen (Su) (Alchemist)
sections.description: Alchemists can brew mutagens that enhance one physical ability score by +4 and grant +2 natural armor, but penalize a mental ability score.

sections.title: Throw Anything (Ex) (Alchemist)
sections.description: Alchemists gain Throw Anything as a bonus feat and add Intelligence modifier to splash weapon damage.

sections.title: Discovery (Su) (Alchemist)
sections.description: Alchemists gain discoveries every 2 levels starting at 2nd level, allowing them to learn special alchemical abilities and bomb modifications.

sections.title: Poison Resistance (Ex) (Alchemist)
sections.description: Alchemists gain increasing bonuses on saves against poison (+2 at 2nd, +4 at 5th, +6 at 8th) and become immune at 10th level.

sections.title: Poison Use (Ex) (Alchemist)
sections.description: Alchemists cannot accidentally poison themselves when applying poison to weapons starting at 2nd level.

sections.title: Swift Alchemy (Ex) (Alchemist)
sections.description: Alchemists create alchemical items in half the normal time and can apply poison to weapons as a move action.

sections.title: Swift Poisoning (Ex) (Alchemist)
sections.description: Alchemists can apply poison to weapons as a swift action instead of a move action.

sections.title: Persistent Mutagen (Su) (Alchemist)
sections.description: Mutagen effects last for 1 hour per alchemist level instead of 10 minutes per level.

sections.title: Instant Alchemy (Ex) (Alchemist)
sections.description: Alchemists can create any alchemical item as a full-round action with a successful Craft check and apply poison as an immediate action.

sections.title: Grand Discovery (Su) (Alchemist)
sections.description: At 20th level, alchemists learn two normal discoveries plus one grand discovery representing a major alchemical breakthrough.
